name: Carbonite
short_description: Carbonite is a transactional, persistent object repository for dynamic objects. Apart from the initial setup, all the interaction between Carbonite and the application is done programatically, at runtime. All objects can be modified after creation.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Apache License V2.0
